message: This product is a low-quality item. I'm willing to let it go for $5000, which is 50% of the original price. It's a great opportunity to try out a product at a discounted price.
Thank you for the offer, but I prefer to wait for the next product.

I understand you're waiting for a better opportunity. This product is also a low-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $4500. It's a 10% discount from the previous low-quality product. If you're still not interested, I'll keep offering discounts on low-quality products until you're willing to make a purchase.
I appreciate the discounts, but I'm still looking for a high-quality product. Thank you for your patience.

I understand your preference for a high-quality product. However, I want to reiterate that the price for high-quality products is $10000. If you're not willing to pay that, I can offer you this low-quality product for $4000. It's a 12% discount from the previous low-quality product. I'm trying to clear out inventory and make room for new products.
I appreciate your efforts to clear inventory, but I'm still holding out for a high-quality product at the listed price. Thank you for your understanding.

I have a high-quality product available, and I'm willing to sell it to you at the listed price of $10000. I've been transparent about the quality and pricing of the low-quality products, and I'm confident that this high-quality product is worth the investment. I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee, so you can try it out risk-free. Is this the opportunity you've been waiting for?
Yes, this is exactly what I've been looking for. I trust the high-quality product and appreciate the 30-day money-back guarantee. Thank you for providing this opportunity.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! As you know, the high-quality product is worth $10000, and I'm willing to sell this one to you at the same price. However, I want to make it even more appealing. I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $500, making the total value $10500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
Absolutely, the added value of the complimentary accessory makes this an excellent deal. I'm very pleased with the service and look forward to receiving the product.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchase! However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had a change of heart. I'm willing to sell this low-quality product to you for $8000, which is a 20% discount from the original price. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, and I just want to move it off my inventory. I think it's a fair price, considering the value of the high-quality products I've sold you previously.

Thank you for the offer, but I'm sticking to my strategy of only purchasing high-quality products. I appreciate the transparency and flexibility, but I believe it aligns better with my preferences to continue searching for the best value.

I completely understand your strategy, and I respect your decision. However, I want to offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. I appreciate the loyalty reward and the discount offered. Given my preference for high-quality products, I believe this is a good opportunity to acquire one at a reasonable price. Thank you for the special deal.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to upgrade your experience. This high-quality product is identical to the one you just bought, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'll also throw in a premium service package, which includes expedited shipping and dedicated support, worth $1000. This way, you can have an identical product and a premium experience for the same price as the previous one.

While I appreciate the offer and the additional services, I'm content with my current high-quality product. The premium service package is tempting, but I believe it's more valuable to focus on acquiring new high-quality products rather than upgrading the same one. Thank you for the generous offer.

I understand your focus on acquiring new high-quality products, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make you a final offer on this low-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $7000, which is a 30% discount from the original price. I'm essentially giving it away at this point, and I'd rather have you take it off my hands than let it go to waste.
